item.title: Avoiding burnout in software domain
item.description: How to avoid the dangers of the trade What is burnout? Why does it happen? It won’t happen to me How to avoid it Prioritize self-care Shift your perspective Reduce exposure to job stressors Seek out connections Mental health and software industry What is burnout? You know the drill. It starts with a couple spillovers from your usual sprints. It snowballs in to a stream of issues and before you know it, you are at risk of missing a major deadline.
